translation.en: [Femi] How the hell did you unlock my car?
translation.ja: どうやって鍵を開けた？

translation.en: Same amount when you get the job done.
[in Pidgin English] Still want me to do it at the wedding?
You know you are really crazy?
[in English] Can you just get the job done?
There is only one pharmaceutical company in this country that has the experience,
translation.ja: 国内で 弊社ほどの 実績を持つ製薬会社は 他にありません

translation.en: to succeed with such an undertaking.
translation.ja: 成功させるノウハウも 有しています
それが― 我がアデモラ社です

translation.en: And we look forward to your decision over the next few days.
translation.ja: 数日後のご決定を お待ちしています

translation.en: And if you have any more questions,
translation.ja: 他にご質問があれば 弊社の技術チームが

translation.en: our technical team will be more than happy to answer them.
translation.ja: 他にご質問があれば 弊社の技術チームが 喜んでお答えします

translation.en: Now, if you will excuse me,
translation.ja: 本日は これで失礼します

translation.en: I really don't want to be late for my own wedding.
translation.ja: 自分の結婚式に遅れますので

translation.en: It's the same as yours. [Kemi] Mm-hmm!
I had it made specially for you.
translation.ja: 特別に作ってもらったの

translation.en: Thank you for standing by me all these years.
translation.ja: ずっと そばにいてくれて 感謝してる
支え合ってきた サラ

translation.en: [in Pidgin English] If not for you, I wouldn't have accomplished half the things in my life.
translation.ja: 〈あなたのおかげで 私は頑張ってこられたの〉

translation.en: You want me to cry and ruin my makeup?
Just don't abandon me because you're married.
[in Yoruba] My goodness, you're so beautiful. [in Pidgin] Look how beautiful you are.
translation.ja: 〈今日のあなた 本当にきれい〉

translation.en: [in English] Girl, you're not serious, I swear.
translation.ja: それ お世辞でしょ

translation.en: And I will be your queen.
It's Kenny. He won't stop calling me. I swear, he's called, like, 12 times.
translation.ja: ケニー 何度もかけてくるの もう10回以上

translation.en: [in Pidgin] For goodness' sake, not today! Block his number.
translation.ja: 〈絶対に出ないで 着信拒否を〉

translation.en: [in English] I've tried. He keeps calling me with different numbers.
translation.ja: 別の番号からかけてくる
会議は？ 順調に進んだよ

translation.en: I thought we spoke about this dress.
translation.ja: なぜ このドレスを

translation.en: I… I tried the other one, but, I don't know, I just felt like this one was better.
translation.ja: もう１着も試したけど こっちの方がいいかと思って

translation.en: [Kemi] Come on, Kola, this dress is perfect.
translation.ja: 何を言うの このドレス 完璧よ

translation.en: The groom is in the house!
Now, I have just 727 things to worry about.
translation.ja: 俺の役目は マジで大変そうだ

translation.en: My man, but you know that's why I chose the best man for my best man?
translation.ja: だから最高の男を 付添人(ベストマン)に選んだ

translation.en: Yeah, let's just hope he lives up to that expectation.
translation.ja: 期待に応えられるといいが

translation.en: Yeah, and now I have to borrow the best woman to go sort out some schedules, hmm?
translation.ja: じゃあ俺は 最高の女性と スケジュールの整理を
予約したオカフォーだ

translation.en: [woman] Are you here for the wedding?
[in Igbo] Hey! Daddy, look at how wonderful this place is.

translation.ja: ああ　まあまあだな

translation.en: -"Nice"? -Mm. [in Igbo] Am I the only one seeing this?
My dear, this hotel is very fine.

translation.ja: ありがとうございます 結婚式にご出席を？

translation.en: -Are you here for the wedding? -Ah-ah, it's our ceremony. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ありがとうございます 結婚式にご出席を？ 私たちは花嫁の両親なの
私たちは花嫁の両親なの
あの写真 そうですか

translation.en: -That's my daughter. -Welcome, Mr. and Mrs. Duru.
translation.ja: 娘よ ようこそ ドゥルご夫妻 鍵の準備を

translation.en: Let me get you your room key.
translation.ja: ようこそ ドゥルご夫妻 鍵の準備を

translation.en: See, all I am saying is that, in the Igbo tradition, this engagement will happen in the…
translation.ja: やはり イボ族の伝統とは やり方が…

translation.en: [in Igbo] Ifeanyi, who prefers salt to sugar?
translation.ja: 〈塩より砂糖が いいに決まってる〉

translation.en: [in English] How would we have been able to afford this place?
translation.ja: こんな場所で挙式するなんて

translation.en: For the ceremony, in our village?
translation.ja: 私たちには無理でしょ

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, here you go. We have you in one of our larger suites.
translation.ja: どうぞ　広いスイートを ご用意しました

translation.en: [in Igbo] Did you hear that? Larger suites! [chuckles] It's not just a room!
translation.ja: 〈広いスイートですって ただの部屋と違う〉

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you, my dear. -Yes, uh, enjoy the wedding.
translation.ja: どうも ご満喫ください

translation.en: Mommy, FJ wants to come show you his outfit.
translation.ja: 母さん ＦＪのスーツ姿を見て
下のボタンが外れてる

translation.en: Hey, there he is! -[chuckles] -The man of the hour.
translation.ja: あら 来たのね 今日の主役のお出ましよ

translation.en: Did you catapult us into a prosperous future?
translation.ja: 私たちの未来は安泰かしら？

translation.en: Let's just say, I'll be astonished if they give it to any of our competitors.
translation.ja: 彼らが他社を選ぶはずないさ 完璧だよ

translation.en: -The pitch was perfect. -That's brilliant, my son.
translation.ja: 彼らが他社を選ぶはずないさ 完璧だよ さすが 私の息子ね

translation.en: Hey, FJ my man! Looking sharp, hmm?
translation.ja: やあ ＦＪ　キマってるな

translation.en: -Hope you guys are fine? -Oh yeah, we're good, we're good.
Mm, that other one was a bit tight.
She knows me. Look at her… Sarah, I need to talk to you.
translation.ja: 知り合いだ 話がしたい

translation.en: Sarah? Just let me talk to her. I need to talk to you, Sarah.
translation.ja: サラ 彼女に話があるんだ

translation.en: It's-- I know him. It's okay. I know him.
translation.ja: 知り合いだから入れて
サラ やめろ 何なの

translation.en: I'm telling you, you're marrying this guy for the wrong reasons, you know it.
translation.ja: あの男との結婚は― 絶対に間違ってる

translation.en: [Sarah] Listen to me, you need to leave now.
translation.ja: お願いよ 今すぐ帰って

translation.en: -I love you. Even in his wildest dreams-- -Look at me, I'll call you.
translation.ja: ケニー 今度 電話するから

translation.en: -I'm going to tear that bastard to shreds. -Hey. Listen--
translation.ja: あの野郎をぶちのめす 行くな

translation.en: I'll handle it, okay? Just stay out of it.
translation.ja: 俺に任せろ　いいな

translation.en: -Hey, get out of here. Now! -Sarah… Sarah, tell him.
translation.ja: おい　今すぐ出てけ

translation.en: Sarah, don't let them do this. Sarah-- Sarah, you're making a mistake.
translation.ja: サラ 彼らを止めて 君は間違ってる

translation.en: Sarah, I love you. Don't let them do this, Sarah.
-[man] Sir-- -[Kenny] I-- I know. I'm just trying to talk to her. Get off me now. Guys, re--
translation.ja: 彼女と話してただけだ もう放せよ

translation.en: Sarah, don't do this. Sarah, you're making a mistake. Sarah!
translation.ja: サラ 思い直すんだ 間違いを犯すな

translation.en: Do not embarrass me this day.
translation.ja: 私に恥をかかせるんじゃ ないわよ

translation.en: -Kola-- -I said, what was he doing here?
Have you been in contact with him?
We just want to thank the Ademola family,
translation.ja: 私たちからアデモラ家に お礼を申し上げたい

translation.en: especially Kola and Uduak, his mother,
translation.ja: 特にコラと お母様の ウドゥアックには

translation.en: for hosting this magnificent engagement. You know, in this very, very fancy hotel.
translation.ja: 豪華なホテルで式を開いて いただき感謝します
この場で まず思い出されるのは

translation.en: and it is only fitting that, uh, at this point,
translation.ja: この場で まず思い出されるのは 偉大な人物である オラダヨ･アデモラです

translation.en: we remember the great man himself, Oladayo Ademola, husband to Uduak,
translation.ja: 偉大な人物である オラダヨ･アデモラです ウドゥアックの夫であり コラとフェミと…

translation.en: and, uh, father to Kola, to, uh, Femi and to…
translation.ja: ウドゥアックの夫であり コラとフェミと…
ティメイン ティメインの父です

translation.en: We all know how proud he would have been to see his youngest son, uh, tie the knot.
translation.ja: 次男の晴れ姿を見たら どれほど誇りに 思ったでしょうか

translation.en: [in English] All my life, I have always played the lottery.
translation.ja: 私は毎週 宝くじを買い

translation.en: [Mr. Duru] Every week, the same number. Every week, the same number.
translation.ja: 同じ番号に賭けているんです

translation.en: [chuckles] But if you ask me, eh, how much have I won?
translation.ja: 今まで いくら勝ったと 思います？
ですが 今日の私は―

translation.en: I feel I am the luckiest man in the whole of Nigeria.
translation.ja: ナイジェリアいち幸運な男に 違いないでしょう

translation.en: First, I'd like to thank you,
translation.ja: まずは お義父(とう)さん お義母(かあ)さんに

translation.en: …for raising the most beautiful woman I have ever seen.
translation.ja: こんなに美しい女性を 育ててくれたことに

translation.en: -[kisses] And for allowing me marry her. -[Sarah] Mm.
I've been working on a drawing of Sarah
translation.ja: 彼女の絵を描きました

translation.en: that I believe captures her beauty…
translation.ja: 彼女の美しさを捉えた 作品です

translation.en: [Mr. Duru, in English] Thank you, Kola.

translation.ja: おめでとう 来たな

translation.en: Do you really think I'd miss your wedding?

translation.ja: キマってる お前も

translation.en: Um, everyone, my daughter, Timeyin, who is studying overseas.
translation.ja: 皆さん 娘のティメインです 海外に留学しています

translation.en: Mom, everybody knows I'm in rehab.
translation.ja: 私はリハビリ施設にいる

translation.en: -It's the biggest news in Lagos. -[Kola chuckles]
translation.ja: ラゴスで有名な話よ こら

translation.en: You all know I'm in rehab, right?
who do I need to fuck to get a drink around here?
translation.ja: 誰とヤれば お酒をもらえる？
冗談だって　落ち着いて

translation.en: I'm 22 days sober, and I intend to stay that way.
translation.ja: 22日間 シラフだし 飲む気はない
偉いな ありがとう

translation.en: How I love this son of mine.
So I guess it's too late to talk you out of this.
translation.ja: あなたを説得するのは もう遅いのね

translation.en: You know I have had Abasiama on the phone
translation.ja: アビーは涙を流しながら 私に電話してきたのよ

translation.en: in a flood of tears every day.
translation.ja: アビーは涙を流しながら 私に電話してきたのよ 毎日ね

translation.en: Abasiama is always in a flood of tears, Mom.
translation.ja: 彼女は いつも大泣きする

translation.en: You two made a… wonderful couple.
translation.ja: あなたたちは すごくお似合いだったのに

translation.en: How long have we known each other?
[in Pidgin] You told me the last time that if he hits you again you'll leave him.
translation.ja: 〈次 彼が手を上げたら 別れるって〉

translation.en: [sobbing] It's Kenny. It's this whole Kenny thing.
-He made him so angry. -Stop making excuses for this animal!
translation.ja: あのクズのために 言い訳するのはやめて

translation.en: -We have to call off this wedding. -Eh?
Kemi, what are you saying? I'm getting married tomorrow.
So you're ready to get married to a man who does this to you?
[in Pidgin] Do you want to be his personal punching bag for the rest of your life?
translation.ja: 〈彼のサンドバッグとして 生きてくの？〉

translation.en: [in English] Is that what you want?
There are enough things to embarrass me
translation.ja: お酒を飲まないとしても

translation.en: without her going on one of her binges.
translation.ja: 何をしでかすか分からない

translation.en: Did Mother send you to watch me?
I'm not going to drink or take drugs or…
translation.ja: お酒もクスリも断ってるし

translation.en: have sex with this bar man.
I don't think I can do this thing.
[in Igbo] What do you mean by "this thing"?
translation.ja: 〈“できない”って 何のこと？〉

translation.en: [in Igbo] My daughter, I'm sure it can't be that bad.
translation.ja: 〈サラ　それくらい 大したことない〉

translation.en: What do you think would happen when your ex-boyfriend turned up?
translation.ja: 〈新婦の元恋人が 突然 現れたのよ〉

translation.en: Have you stopped to think how embarrassing that could have been for Kola and the whole family?
translation.ja: コラとご家族が恥をかいたの 分からない？

translation.en: [exhales] It wasn't my fau… I didn't even know Kenny was coming.
translation.ja: 私のせいじゃない ケニーが勝手に来た

translation.en: But I didn't know he was coming! Mommy, I'm telling you that Kola hurts me.
translation.ja: コラは私を傷つける人なのよ

translation.en: [in Igbo] that you want to let go?
translation.ja: つまり あなたは― 〈手放したいと？〉

translation.en: [in English] You're willing to let go of everything…
translation.ja: 何もかも 失っていいってこと？

translation.en: I know this is the work of my enemies. They will not succeed.
translation.ja: 〈これは敵の仕業ね 望むところよ〉

translation.en: [in English] Do you have any idea…
translation.ja: あなたは理解してない

translation.en: the sacrifices your father and I have made…
translation.ja: お父さんと私の犠牲の上に―

translation.en: to place you where you are today?
Look at me. Look at me.
translation.ja: 見なさいよ　私の姿を

translation.en: A few years ago, did I used to look like this?
translation.ja: 数年前とは 見違えるほど変わった

translation.en: [in Igbo] It's because of the money.
[in English] That is what money does.
So, you think your father's business
translation.ja: お父さんの事業は どうなってたと思う？

translation.en: would have survived a day without the support and help
translation.ja: あの一家のサポートが なければ １日も持たずに

translation.en: So you're not the only one involved,
translation.ja: この状況で考えるべきは―

translation.en: the only one to think about in this situation, are you?
translation.ja: あなたのことだけじゃないの

translation.en: [in English] Let your face glow as the bride to be.
translation.ja: 花嫁らしく 晴れやかな顔をするのよ

translation.en: -[Kola] Aunty, it's good to see you. -Kola.
translation.ja: おばさん 会えてうれしい
元気？　とってもハンサムよ

translation.en: Chai, let me kiss you one last time as a single man.
translation.ja: 独身最後に もう一度 キスさせて

translation.en: Kola, are you really going to do this?
translation.ja: コラ 本当に結婚するの？

translation.en: Too bad for me, I guess.
Hey. I cannot be dealing with this,
[in Yourba] Kola, please don't do this.
[inhales] [in English] Abby, this is not appropriate.
translation.ja: 場所をわきまえてくれ

translation.en: -[panting] -What the fuck is this? Who sent you?
translation.ja: 何のマネだ　誰がお前を？

translation.en: The guy being taken out there. Looks like you know him.
translation.ja: 連れ出された男だよ 知り合いだろ

translation.en: Did you hire the guy to kill me?
If anything happens to me, look to our brother.
translation.ja: 俺に何かあったら 兄を疑え

translation.en: What do you mean, what's happened?
Look… whatever's happened, right now, you need to forget about it.
translation.ja: 何か起きたとしても 今は忘れなきゃダメよ

translation.en: The guy we sent to him, he caught him himself.
translation.ja: 送り込んだ男が捕まった

translation.en: [man] How are you? Good to see you.
We need to get you and the ladies underway, huh?
translation.ja: 主役の二人は準備を ああ

translation.en: -Sarah wants to talk to Kola. -Right now?
[exhales] The engagement is about to start.
There will be no engagement unless she speaks to him right now.
translation.ja: 彼女と話さなければ 中止になる

translation.en: You promised me. The last time this happened.
translation.ja: 前回 約束してくれたわよね

translation.en: You said it would never happen again.
But you said it was never going to happen again.
translation.ja: あの言葉で思いとどまったの
サラ？ すべてが間違い

translation.en: I don't want to marry you, Kola.
Sarah, you cannot do this, not now.
translation.ja: ふざけたことを言うな

translation.en: -The hall's packed with people we invited. -Someone will need to tell them.
translation.ja: 大勢が待ってる 彼らに伝えて

translation.en: If you want, I can go and tell them why this wedding is not going to hold.
translation.ja: 私から 中止の理由を 言ってもいい

translation.en: You will not embarrass me, embarrass my family.
translation.ja: 俺と家族に恥をかかせるな
あなたとは結婚しない

translation.en: -I'm not marrying you, Kola. -You will marry me.
-You will marry me. -I'm not marrying you!
translation.ja: 結婚するんだ イヤ！
よくも俺を裏切ったな！

translation.en: I'm going to kill the both of you.
Why does he have a gun? Why does he have a gun?
translation.ja: 彼は なぜ銃なんて…
えっと…　脈の確認を

translation.en: I'm not sure you're aware, but they're like 200 people outside waiting to see an engagement.
translation.ja: 200人の招待客が 式の始まりを待ってる

translation.en: Oh, yeah, we know, we'll be down soon.
Yeah, sure. Of course. Why not?
I mean, of… Yeah, there was-- there was a bit of hiccup in there, um,
translation.ja: まあ 実はちょっと もめたけど

translation.en: but a bit of makeup. Great.

translation.ja: いいえ　さっきまでいた

translation.en: [sputters] He was here. Normal pre-wedding jitters,
translation.ja: よくあるマリッジブルー だったみたい

translation.en: but he's left already, just a few minutes ago.
Oh, uh, I must have missed him on my way up. Yeah, sure.
translation.ja: そうか　行き違いかな

translation.en: Uh, that's fine. I'll go find him.
But please get Sarah down as soon as possible.
I said you would be down as soon as possible.
translation.ja: あなたが すぐに会場へ行くと

translation.en: We can't. We-- Kemi, Kola is dead.
Nobody knows that. Nobody knows where he is.
translation.ja: 誰も彼の居場所を知らない

translation.en: We need to move him to the bathroom. Move.
translation.ja: 風呂場に運ぼう 急いで　さあ早く
ママよ ええ　これを

translation.en: Here. I'll take care of it.
translation.ja: ええ　これを 何とかする

translation.en: -Aunty, good afternoon. -Kemi! -What is holding you girls? -Nothing.
translation.ja: ケミ 何をモタモタしてるの

translation.en: People are waiting. Have you seen outside? Where is she?
translation.ja: みんな待ってるのよ サラは？

translation.en: [in Igbo] Now my mind is at peace. Look how beautiful my daughter is.
translation.ja: 〈ホッとしたわ なんて美しいの〉

translation.en: You are as pretty as God made you.
[in English] No, no. Don't spoil your makeup.
translation.ja: メイクが台なしになる

translation.en: [in Igbo] I've prayed to God for today.
[in English] Everything is going to be fine.
translation.ja: すべて うまくいくわ

translation.en: [in English] They tell me that, uh, you have brought a man.
translation.ja: 結婚相手を 連れてくるはずでは？

translation.en: Go and find him and then bring him to me.
translation.ja: 彼を私の所に連れてきなさい
彼を私の所に連れてきなさい いいな

translation.en: -Something is wrong. -Mm? [in Igbo] Looks like Kola is absent.
translation.ja: 〈変ね コラが見当たらない〉

translation.en: What in God's name is going on?
translation.ja: 一体 どうなってるの？

translation.en: I don't know. He just vanished.
You will have to tell people.
I don't understand. Tell them what?
I don't know, Akin, but someone has to tell them something.
translation.ja: さあね アキン でも間を持たせないと
式が中断しておりまして―

translation.en: [exhales] We are dealing with some unforeseen circumstances.
translation.ja: 現在 不測の事態に 対応しています

translation.en: Uh, so, um… But please enjoy,
translation.ja: お待ちの間 飲み物や食事を―

translation.en: carry on with the lovely food and drinks available.
translation.ja: どうぞお楽しみください

translation.en: We'll-- We'll-- We'll recommence proceedings as soon as we can. Okay?
translation.ja: できるだけ早く 式を再開いたします

translation.en: [Akin] Yeah, there's something very wrong going on.
I think at the very last moment Kola has come to his senses.
translation.ja: 最後の最後に コラは我に返ったのよ

translation.en: I mean, he took a look at this whole circus.
translation.ja: すべて茶番だったとね

translation.en: This pathetic family from the village
translation.ja: 田舎の哀れな一族と 家族になるなんて―

translation.en: that he was marrying into, and he just couldn't do it.
translation.ja: 田舎の哀れな一族と 家族になるなんて― できるわけないと

translation.en: -Yeah, I don't think that's it. -I think that is what's happened.
translation.ja: 違うと思う 私は そう確信してる
俺に話を… したはずよ

translation.en: He just took to the hills.
And even though this whole fiasco will cost me an arm and a leg,
translation.ja: この状況は 私にとっても大きな打撃よ

translation.en: I'd rather take the hit now

translation.ja: これで あの農民たちと―

translation.en: peasants for the rest of my life.
translation.ja: これで あの農民たちと― 縁を切れるんだもの

translation.en: [Mr. Duru] Sarah, I do not understand.
translation.ja: サラ どういうことだ

translation.en: -Daddy, I don't know. -Ah. Where is Kola?
translation.ja: 分からないの コラは？

translation.en: -I don't know. -Does he not want this marriage again?
translation.ja: 知らない 彼が不満を？

translation.en: Da… How many times do I have to say I do not know?
translation.ja: だから分からないって

translation.en: Don't be rude to your father.
I'm not being rude. I honestly don't know.

translation.ja: 結婚が破談になったら―

translation.en: [in Igbo] please give me one minute to talk to Sarah alone.
No, because honestly, we really need that money.
translation.ja: あのカネがないと困る

translation.en: -Ifi. Ifi. -[Mr. Duru] Our life depends on the money.
translation.ja: ねえ 路頭に迷うことに

translation.en: -[Mrs. Duru, in Igbo] One minute, please. -Okay… This… Okay.
translation.ja: すぐに済む だが… まったく

translation.en: You had better tell me exactly what is going on.
translation.ja: 何があったのか言いなさい

translation.en: Does this have anything to do with that nonsense you were talking about last night?
translation.ja: 昨夜のバカげた話と 関係があるの？

translation.en: If my enemies try me, they'll see me.
God, you will not put me to shame. No!
The free lunch is over, people.
Our lawyers will be in touch in the morning.
translation.ja: 弁護士から連絡させます

translation.en: [sobbing] It was self-defense. He was trying to kill me.
translation.ja: 殺されかけたの 正当防衛よ

translation.en: It doesn't matter. It doesn't matter. Don't you know these people?
translation.ja: あの一族が納得すると思う？

translation.en: I killed their golden son. They'll lkill me and tear me to pieces.
translation.ja: きっと私は八つ裂きにされる

translation.en: Okay, so what are we going to do?
translation.ja: きっと私は八つ裂きにされる どうする？ コラの遺体が部屋に

translation.en: -Kola's body is right there in my room. -We need to get him out of here.
translation.ja: どうする？ コラの遺体が部屋に 運ばないと
どう？ 分からないよ
ウソ　本気でこれを？

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Please, can you come to this side?
-Why? -It looks like he's staring at me.
translation.ja: なぜ？ 彼が睨(にら)んでる

translation.en: Do you want him to be staring at me?
You're not the one that was supposed to marry this man.
-We start from the head. -Oh no, Kemi. What's that?
translation.ja: 頭からね ケミ 正気なの？

translation.en: Don't you watch those beheading videos? Start from the head, there's less bones.
translation.ja: 首切りの動画を見たら 骨が少なかった

translation.en: Actually, I've never watched a beheading video.
translation.ja: 私は そんなの見ない

translation.en: [gasps] [in Pidgin] Okay, please, I need a drink.
translation.ja: お酒を飲まないと無理

translation.en: Can you help me check the mini bar?
[groans] We need to do this now.
Hey, uh, bro, I'm just trying to find out where the hell you are.
translation.ja: お前 どこに 行っちまったんだ

translation.en: And you'd better have a good excuse for this.
Guy, please, just let me know you're okay, hmm?
translation.ja: とにかく無事を知らせてくれ

translation.en: There is no way on earth we can cut up his whole body.
translation.ja: 全身を切断するなんて
あとは何を？ それよ

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Are you still doing laundry at this time?
Yes, it's the guest laundry from the wedding. The manager sent us.
translation.ja: 〈結婚式のゲストの 洗濯物を運べと〉

translation.en: Where do you think Mr. Ademola is hiding?
translation.ja: 〈新郎は どこに行ったと思う？〉

translation.en: -[scoffs] I don't know. -We don't know. We have to go.
That man didn't want to marry, that's why he ran.
translation.ja: 〈彼は結婚がイヤで 逃げたのさ〉

translation.en: If you think about it, it's the bride's fault.
The bride looks like someone who would want to control her husband.
translation.ja: 〈夫を支配したそうな ツラしてた〉

translation.en: It's her fault. [in English] No one can tell me otherwise.
translation.ja: 〈女が悪い 俺の読みは正しいぞ〉

translation.en: [in English] Hey! Sarah. Let's go. Focus.
-[camera beeps, clicks] -What the hell are these two up to?
translation.ja: あの二人 何してる
